column3: ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19802/commits/8de51d1513ada6d96b80f164da48088e5cdcbe3f\nThe travis lint run error seems like soms kind of unrelated network corruption issue, but running it again just in case.

- perhaps s/parameter/option|configuration option/ (`Usage:  bitcoind [options]`)\n\n- per `bitcoind -help-debug | grep -C3 -i cidr` and `git grep -ni netmask`, maybe verify if netmasks are also used for the `-whitelist` option
